---
title: "Tests"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}

covid_summaries <- read_csv("../data/covid_summaries.csv", 
    col_types = cols(Date = col_date(format = "%m/%d/%Y")))
View(covid_summaries)
```

```{r}
covid_summaries <- covid_summaries %>% 
  drop_na() 

```

```{r}
covid_summaries <- covid_summaries %>% 
  mutate(normalized = `Total Tested`/`Total Detained`)
```


```{r}
ggplot(covid_summaries) +
 aes(x = Date, y = `Total Tested`) +
 geom_line()+
  geom_smooth()
```


```{r}
ggplot(covid_summaries) +
 aes(x = Date, y = `normalized`) +
 geom_line()+
  geom_smooth()
```
